name: EmailAutoPrint

screenshots.caption: AutoPrint Startup Splash Screen (Add-In Starts with Microsoft Outlook)

short_description:
This Microsoft Office Outlook Add-In provides an email based printing solution for your home or business.

This system uses Microsoft Office to automatically process email using keywords in the subject line to print email messages and certain supported attachments (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, PDF, JPG).

When combined with a Microsoft Exchange server and network printers, this can effectively make every printer in your office an email based printer.  Simply place a placard near your printer telling users the code that you have assigned to the printer and all of your employees, contractors and visitors can print from their iPhones, BlackBerry, Android or Windows phones or from virtually any device or computer that is capable of sending email.

I developed this initially back in 2009 and have made a few changes along the way.  Many people have asked for it and I've been happy to give it away.  I'd like to provide the entire solution here for the community.
